entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow or periods of rain ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
